SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.symyx.draw
Interface JDrawPreferences

public interface JDrawPreferences

Interface for display preference settings such as how to show background color, foreground color, implicit hydrogens, bond length.

Field Summary
static int HYDROGEN_ALL
          Displays implicit hydrogens on all atoms.
static int HYDROGEN_HETERO
          Displays implicit hydrogens on heteroatoms.
static int HYDROGEN_OFF
          Does not display any kind of implicit hydrogen atoms.
static int HYDROGEN_TERMINAL
          Displays implicit hydrogens on terminal atoms.
static int HYDROGEN_TERMINAL_AND_HETERO
          Displays implicit hydrogens on terminal atoms and heteroatoms.
static int POL_STYLE_BEAD
          Displays atoms of type Pol as circles that look like beads (default)
static int POL_STYLE_TEXT
          Displays atoms of type Pol with the text Pol
static int STEREODISPLAY_BOND_ONLY
          Color stereo bonds only for stereo center display
static int STEREODISPLAY_LABEL_BOND
          Color both stereo labels and stereo bonds for stereo center display
static int STEREODISPLAY_LABEL_ONLY
          Color stereo labels only for stereo center display
static int STEREODISPLAY_OFF
          Do not color stereo labels or bonds for stereo center display
static int STEREOLABEL_CLASSIC
          Display stereochemistry in Classic style (display all stereo labels(abs/and/or) unless it's Absolute or AND Enantiomer state.
static int STEREOLABEL_IUPAC
          Display stereochemistry in IUPAC style
static int STEREOLABEL_OFF
          Do not display stereo labels (abs/and/or)
static int STEREOLABEL_ON
          Display stereo labels (abs/and/or) always
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAbsStereoLabelText()
          Returns the text string of Absolute stereo mode label
 java.lang.String getAndStereoLabelText()
          Returns the text string of And Enantiomer stereo mode label
 java.awt.Color getBackgroundColor()
          Returns the color of the drawing surface, which is the background for the structure.
 double getBondLabelSize()
          Returns the height of bond labels as a fraction of average bond length.
 boolean getColorAtomsByType()
           
 double getDefaultBondLength()
          Returns the default bond length, which by default is 0.7 cm, which is 184.42 sketch units because a sketch unit is 1/720th of an inch.
 int getDisplayChiralStereoLabels()
          Returns the integer value that corresponds to displayChiralStereoLabels such as that of STEREOLABEL_IUPAC, STEREOLABEL_CLASSIC, STEREOLABEL_ON and STEREOLABEL_OFF
 java.awt.Color getForegroundColor()
          Returns the color of the structure.
 int getHydrogenDisplayMode()
          Returns an integer that represents the mode of hydrogen display, such as that of HYDROGEN_OFF
 double getLabelHeight()
          Returns the height of the label as a percentage of average bond length
 java.lang.String getMixedStereoLabelText()
          Returns the text string of Mixed stereo mode label
 java.lang.String getOrStereoLabelText()
          Returns the text string of Or Enantiomer stereo mode label
 int getPolAtomDisplayMode()
          Returns true if set to POL_STYLE_BEAD
 java.awt.Color getStereoAbsColor()
          Returns the color of abs stereo labels
 java.awt.Color getStereoAndColor()
          Returns the color of And stereo labels
 int getStereoGroupColorDisplay()
          Returns the integer value that corresponds to stereoGroupColorDisplay such as that of STEREODISPLAY_LABEL_BOND, STEREODISPLAY_BOND_ONLY
 java.awt.Color getStereoOrColor()
          Returns the color of Or stereo labels
 void setAbsStereoLabelText(java.lang.String absText)
          Sets the text string of Absolute stereo mode label - Default: ""
 void setAndStereoLabelText(java.lang.String andText)
          Sets the text string of And Enantiomer stereo mode label - Default: "AND Enantiomer"
 void setBackgroundColor(java.awt.Color bgColor)
          Sets the color of the drawing surface, which is the background for the structure - Default: White
 void setBondLabelSize(double bondLabelSize)
          Sets the height of bond labels as a fraction of average bond length.
 void setColorAtomsByType(boolean colorAtomsByType)
           
 void setDefaultBondLength(double defaultBondLength)
          Sets the default bond length, which by default is 0.7 cm, which is 184.42 sketch units because a sketch unit is 1/720th of an inch.
 void setDisplayChiralStereoLabels(int displayStereoLabelsMode)
          Sets the mode of displayChiralStereoLabels, such as STEREOLABEL_IUPAC
 void setForegroundColor(java.awt.Color fgColor)
          Sets the color of the structure - Default: Black.
 void setHydrogenDisplayMode(int hydrogenDisplayMode)
          Sets the mode of hydrogen display, such as that of HYDROGEN_OFF
 void setLabelHeight(double labelHeight)
          Sets the height of the label as a percentage of average bond length - default: 0.45
 void setMixedStereoLabelText(java.lang.String mixedText)
          Sets the text string of Mixed stereo mode label - Default: "Mixed"
 void setOrStereoLabelText(java.lang.String orText)
          Sets the text string of Or Enantiomer stereo mode label - Default: "OR Enantiomer"
 void setPolAtomDisplayMode(int polAtomStyle)
          Sets whether to display atoms of type Pol as POL_STYLE_BEAD (0) or POL_STYLE_TEXT (1).
 void setStereoAbsColor(java.awt.Color absColor)
          Sets the color of abs stereo labels - Default: Red
 void setStereoAndColor(java.awt.Color andColor)
          Sets the color of And stereo labels - Default: Purple
 void setStereoGroupColorDisplay(int stereoGroupColorDisplayMode)
          Sets the mode of stereoGroupColorDisplay, such as STEREODISPLAY_LABEL_BOND
 void setStereoOrColor(java.awt.Color orColor)
          Sets the color of Or stereo labels - Default: Green
 void setSubscriptFontRatio(double d)
